alert.note: Alert for Sunflower (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 09 at 4:51PM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHERN SUNFLOWER COUNTY THROUGH 515 PM CST... At 451 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Indianola, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Indianola, Moorhead, Sunflower, and Blaine around 455 PM CST. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until midnight CST for north central and northwestern Mississippi.
